Posts.Content: On Dec 17, 2017 9:52 AM Ladyrumpers wrote: I am a breast cancer survivor ofnearly 17 years,recently l have noticed a tiny amount of blood from the nipple of the affected breast,l have an inverted nipple,always have had,anyone got advice? From everything I have read. Anything that is not normal, that is, change of shape, orange peel looking area, dimples, rash, and fluid from breast should be checked out. Make an apppointment and remember always get a second or third opinion. Do research as well.
Posts.Title: Breast,
